text: Dražen "Praja" Dalipagić (27 November 1951 – 25 January 2025) was a Serbian professional basketball player and head coach. In 2004, he was honored into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame. An Olympic medalist, he won a silver medal in 1976, a gold medal in 1980, and a bronze in 1984. Dalipagić died on 25 January 2025 in Belgrade, Serbia at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Dražen Dalipagić at the FIBA Hall of Fame Category:1951 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Olympic silver medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Serbian basketball players Category:Small forwards
title: Dražen Dalipagić
